metadata.name: SHREE- The divine Feminine
metadata.description:
Radiance of a thousand suns on her face, her skin a shimmery gold, 
Adorned with exotic jewels & draped in red, her beauty was untold. 
Born from the Ksheer Sagarâ€™s intense churning, she appeared in all her grace. 
The beauty of the entire universe reflecting on her perfect face. 
Goddess of prosperity as she is known, & prayed to for wealthy pleasure 
But spiritual liberation granted by her is your greatest treasure 
Worshipped on diwali, she enters your humble abode in delight. 
But will reject a place that is home to malice & fights  
For cleanliness not only lies in how you keep your floors & walls spick & span. 
How you treat your women and elders is also a good testament 
For it is true as true can be, The lady of the house is herself a form of Shree.

** Hi-res Jpeg is available for collectors; contact me via DM. 
** Music/Vocals by Samarth Saxena, recorded in studios with pro musicians, excl to the Rebel Club's Diwali Collab
